name: Jon Ugarte
summary: I build scalable, cloud-native data infrastructure on AWS to solve complex operational problems. At Amazon, I've created EU-wide data reporting tools and real-time monitoring systems that empower teams and have delivered multi-million dollar project benefits. Focused on turning data into a reliable asset for business decision-making.
summary_long:
I build cloud-native data infrastructure that gives business teams the clarity to make faster, smarter decisions. At Amazon, I've delivered EU-wide data tools and real-time monitoring systems that directly contributed to over $18M in operational savings.

My career path into data engineering began with a decisive shift: moving to London to earn a Master's in Data Science and rebuild my career from the ground up. This experience translates into a practical focus on building data systems that serve a clear business purpose. I specialize in creating scalable data architecture on AWS, with a focus on turning complex data into reliable, accessible resources that empower teams and improve operations.
